welcome_message_body: Welcome to Mogi das Cruzes, where the charm of historic architecture and lush greenery await you. Known for its vibrant culture and delicious cuisine, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our beautiful city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Feijão & Cia
restaurants.description: Feijão & Cia is a brazilian restaurant located in Mogi das Cruzes.
restaurants.address: R. Cel. Souza Franco, 710-808 - Centro, Mogi das Cruzes, SP, 08710-020

restaurants.name: Apollo Grill
restaurants.description: Apollo Grill is a churrascaria located in Mogi das Cruzes.
restaurants.address: R. Dr. Ricardo Vilela, 155 (R. Cel. Moreira da Glória), Mogi das Cruzes, SP, 08773-060

restaurants.name: MN Lamen
restaurants.description: MN Lamen is a noodle restaurant located in Mogi da Cruzes.
restaurants.address: R. Cel. Souza Franco , 813, Mogi da Cruzes, SP

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and smallest terminal at Guarulhos Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at Guarulhos Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and most modern terminal at Guarulhos Airport, dedicated to international flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require registration and have time limits.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sao Jose Dos Campos Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Complimentary for all passengers. No password required.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Congonhas International Airport, serving domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Congonhas International Airport, mainly used by regional airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights and private jets.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
